title: CyberLink PowerDirector 11 Ultra 11.0.0.3026 Multilang [ChingLiu
description:
What is new in version 11.0.0 build 3026

- Supports NewBlue Video Essentials V and VI effect packs.
- Improves scene detection accuracy.
- Resolves program crash at aticaldd.dll module when creating Blu-ray discs with hardware encoding on some AMD graphics card platforms.
- Resolves green screen or broken image issue in output video when using hardware decoding.
- Resolves green screen or broken image issue in output HDV or AVCHD video when using SVRT with NVIDIA or AMD graphics card.
- Resolves eCOOC0005 error when burning to Blu-ray disc or SD card with menus.
- Resolves error in the time property of library videos caused by daylight savings.
- Resolves a malfunction when applying user-defined Magic Motion to all clips in build 2707.
- Resolves "Encountered an improper argument" error when creating title templates with "Scroll up" animation effect in build 2707.

Recommended System Requirements

Operating Systems
Microsoft WindowsÃ‚Â® 8, 7, Vista or XP (Service Pack 3).

Screen Resolution
1024 x 768, 16-bit color or above

CPU Processor
* PowerDirector 11 is optimized for CPUs with MMX/SSE/SSE2/3DNow!/3DNow! Extension/HyperThreading technology.
* AVI Capture/Produce: Profiles: Pentium 4 3.0 Ghz or AMD Athlon 64 X2
* DVD Quality (MPEG-2) Profiles: Pentium 4 3.0 Ghz or AMD Athlon 64 X2
* High Quality MPEG-4 and Streaming WMV, QuickTime) Profiles: Pentium 4 3.0 Ghz or AMD Athlon 64 X2
* Full-HD quality H.264 and MPEG2 Profiles: Intel Corei5/7 or AMD Phenom II X4
* AVCHD and BD burning Profiles: Pentium Core 2 Duo E6400, or AMD Phenom II X2
* 2K/4K/3D* video editing profile: Intel Corei7 or AMD Phenom II X4 with 64 bit OS 6 GB RAM

Languages : English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Chinese (Traditional), Chinese (Simplified), Japanese, Korean, Dutch, Russian, Polish, Czech, Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Portugal), Polish, Danish, Finnish, Norwegian, Swedish
